desc: Selling and buying user grade and collectors grade antique vintage hand tools in Melbourne Australia since 2012. Premium quality hand sharpened sharp tenon dovetail saw Heritage Saws. Plane planes chisel woodworking woodworker carpenter carpentry cabinetmaker old tools handtools antiques natural sharpening stones razor

layout.text:
Based in Melbourne, Australia, VINTAGE TOOL SHOP has been selling ANTIQUE & VINTAGE hand tools in our online shop since 2012, and our physical shop since 2019.
We are passionate custodians of these tools and, along with our hand-crafted HERITAGE SAWS, are proud to offer these products to both collectors and active tradesmen alike.
